howto.title: Use this checklist as a guide
howto.why: This app is designed to help homeowners spot common issues before they become expensive problems.
howto.look: Work through items at your own pace. You can stop and resume anytime.
howto.note: This is educational, not a substitute for a professional inspection.

spring.title: Inspect exterior hose bibs
spring.why: Freeze damage often goes unnoticed until water is turned back on.
spring.look: Leaks at shutoff valves, cracked fittings, water stains.
spring.note: Homes built before 1990 often lack frost-free hose bibs.

summer.title: Check deck attachments
summer.why: Deck ledger failures are a leading cause of deck collapses.
summer.note: Improper ledger attachment is common in older decks.

fall.title: Shut down exterior water lines
fall.why: Water left in lines can freeze and cause hidden damage.
fall.look: Proper shutoff, drained lines, capped hose bibs.
fall.note: Compressed air may be required in some systems.

winter.title: Monitor attic insulation
winter.why: Poor insulation contributes to ice dams and heat loss.
winter.look: Compressed insulation, air gaps, moisture staining.
winter.note: Ice dams often indicate air leakage, not just insulation depth.

safety.title: Test smoke and CO alarms
safety.look: Expired units, missing alarms, weak sound.
